Name: Sheptun
About the game: The legendary cowboy Jack Johnson triumphantly returned to his hometown, but he realized that he had lost things dear to him. Now he has to return to the dead city, looking in the face of fear and danger, well, or looking in the face of joy and fun. You have to find all the objects forgotten by him, to escape from ghosts and demons, after which you will survive from this inhospitable city. About the game: A fun game about finding objects and saving from monsters. The cowboyâ€™s fears are terrible for him, but funny for us. Avoid monsters, do not step into mines. The old lantern must be recharged in a special, secret way. Rise from Hell! Bring back the skeleton to get out of the city. The coolest first-aid kits in your life. Interesting and unusual sound effects for immersion in the atmosphere.
